title: 2 Plat Players Looking For A Team
body:
A friend and I have recently come to the conclusion that minimal communication in solo que is mind numbing. 
We have wanted to join a team for a little while now but haven't followed through. We are currently ranked Plat 5 and Gold 1, currently climbing as we both were plat last season. Not a big achievement for solo que we know, but we work well as a duo and can't see any issues with a team aswell. 

I myself have coached and played in a team before consisting of a couple diamonds and a master player, back when team ranked was a thing. So I do know the in's and outs of the strategies and communication neccesary. We are after a team that is determined to climb higher and gain more skills and knowledge. But also a team that will be regular, instead of not just a one time thing. 

We both have discord and are willing to start whenever. As a duo we play a fairly decent botlane, but we can also jungle and mid with a variety of champions.

Add me in game if you wanted to discuss more or if we are able to join the team, or you want a trial: **Cant Be Slowed**

replies.body:
Hey mate, me and a few boys have been looking for two players to join our team.

We have two gold players and a plat and need a good duo bot to fill out our team. I will add you tonight to hopefully discuss more.
Sounds good mate. Sorry I missed you last night, shouldn't tonight though. Thanks for the reply, talk soon.
Come on tonight if you can just after 6. I will be on for a few hours...
